item.title: Global crypto funds rebound with nearly $900 million in net inflows last week
item.content:encoded:
摘要：
这些信息是积极的。上周资本流回了加密货币投资工具，弥补了上周的大部分资金流出。
Capital flowed back into crypto investment vehicles last week, making up for much of the previous week's outflows.

item.title: Thailand’s top crypto exchange Bitkub plans IPO in 2025: Bloomberg
item.content:encoded:
摘要：这些信息是积极的。根据彭博社报道，Bitkub的在线加密货币交易平台目前价值60亿泰铢，约合1.65亿美元。
Bitkub's online crypto trading platform is currently valued at 6 billion baht, or around $165 million, according to a Bloomberg report.

item.title: Tether's bitcoin holdings cross $5 billion mark after latest purchase
item.content:encoded:
摘要：这些信息是积极的。根据报告，Tether在2024年第一季度购买了8,888个比特币，使其总持有量达到约75,354个BTC，价值超过52亿美元。
Tether bought 8,888 more bitcoins in the first quarter of 2024, increasing its total holdings to about 75,354 BTC — worth over $5.2 billion.

item.title: Bitcoin lingers below $70,000 as sideways price action continues
item.content:encoded:
摘要：

这些信息是消极的。
全球最大的加密货币周一下午亚洲时间出现轻微价格下跌，围绕在7万美元左右波动。
The world’s largest cryptocurrency saw a minor price dip on Monday afternoon in Asia, as it continues fluctuating around $70,000.

item.title: Hedge fund manager Mark Yusko predicts $150,000 Bitcoin by end of year, spurred by halving
item.content:encoded:
摘要：这些信息是积极的。Morgan Creek Capital的CEO告诉CNBC，他认为即将到来的比特币减半会推动比特币在2024年底前的价格超过两倍。
The Morgan Creek Capital CEO told CNBC he thinks the upcoming halving could spur Bitcoin to more than double in price by the end of 2024.

item.title: Consensys urges SEC to recognize Ethereum's better-than-Bitcoin qualities
item.content:encoded:
摘要：
这些信息是积极的。ConsenSys敦促SEC考虑以太坊的积极特质，有时甚至比比特币更好。这些特质包括更高的可扩展性、更快的交易速度、更低的费用、更广泛的开发者社区和更多的应用实用性。这种优势使以太坊成为一个更具吸引力的加密货币平台。
Consensys urged the SEC to consider Ethereum's positive qualities that — in some cases — are better than Bitcoin's.

item.title: Grayscale launching proof-of-stake investment fund for millionaires
item.content:encoded:
摘要：
这些信息是积极的。Grayscale推出了一项基金，将管理多种代币的权益挖矿和解锁。
Grayscale is launching a fund that will manage the staking and unstaking of multiple tokens.

item.title: Spot bitcoin ETFs see fourth consecutive day of net inflows to end the month
item.content:encoded:
摘要：这些信息是积极的。比特币现货交易所交易所的资金流入情况连续第四天保持净正，表现良好。
Flows into spot bitcoin exchange-traded funds remained net positive on Thursday for the fourth consecutive day.

item.title: Bitwise files for spot Ethereum ETF amid SEC approval uncertainty
item.content:encoded:
摘要：
这些信息是积极的。尽管公司的首席信息官表示，最好是等到五月后再批准现货以太ETF，Bitwise还是正式申请了一个。
Although the firm's CIO said it might be better if spot ether ETFs are approved later than May, Bitwise has officially applied for one anyway.

item.title: Filecoin protocol Glif set to distribute 75 million points ahead of token launch
item.content:encoded:
摘要：这些信息是积极的。Filecoin的流动租赁协议Glif将在代币发布前分发7500万点。
Glif, a Filecoin liquid leasing protocol, is set to distribute 75 million points ahead of its token launch.

item.title: MicroStrategy trades at 'unjustifiable premium' to bitcoin, says firm shorting company's stock
item.content:encoded:
摘要： 这些信息是消极的。Kerrisdale Capital对MicroStrategy的股票做空，同时对由BlackRock和Fidelity提供的现货比特币ETF进行做多。
Kerrisdale Capital is short on MicroStrategy's stock and long on spot bitcoin ETFs offered by BlackRock and Fidelity.

item.title: Tokenized US Treasuries on public blockchains surpass $1 billion in AUM
item.content:encoded:
摘要：
这些信息是积极的。富兰克林庙廷公司的BENJI基金达到了3.6亿美元的规模，而黑石集团的新“BUIDL”代币化基金在短短一周内就增长到了2.45亿美元。
Franklin Templeton’s BENJI leads on $360 million, while BlackRock’s new “BUIDL” tokenized fund has grown to $245 million in just a week.

item.title: BlackRock’s spot Bitcoin ETF amasses 250,000 BTC as Fidelity’s crosses $10 billion AUM
item.content:encoded:
摘要：
这些信息是积极的。ARK Invest 21Shares的ARKB比特币ETF在周三吸引了超过2亿美元的最佳每日资金流入。这显示出对比特币ETF的投资兴趣正在增加，尤其是对于ARK Invest 21Shares的产品。这表明投资者对加密货币市场的信心可能在增强。
Meanwhile, Ark Invest 21Shares’ ARKB spot Bitcoin ETF generated its best daily inflows of more than $200 million on Wednesday.

item.title: Hong Kong finance firm VSFG aims to launch spot bitcoin ETF as early as May
item.content:encoded:
摘要：
这些信息是积极的。该公司表示已向证监会提交了比特币ETF申请，并正在与香港监管机构进行积极的讨论。
The firm said it has filed its spot bitcoin ETF application with the SFC and is 'in active discussion' with the Hong Kong regulator.

item.title: Memecoins are the next ‘Trojan Horse’ for crypto adoption, says Messari VP of research
item.content:encoded:
摘要: 这些信息是积极的。Messari的研究副总裁Maartje Bus在BUIDL Asia活动中表示，Memecoin具有将加密货币介绍给更广泛受众的效用。这有助于拓展加密货币的普及度。
Memecoins have the utility to introduce crypto to a wider range of audience, Messari’s VP of Research Maartje Bus said at BUIDL Asia.

item.title: Casa expands self-custody inheritance solution globally for bitcoin, ether and stablecoins
item.content:encoded:
摘要：这些信息是积极的。该功能允许用户自行保管比特币、以太坊、美元稳定币和USDC，并分享对其Casa保险库的继承访问权限。
The feature allows users to take self-custody of bitcoin, ether, USDT and USDC and share inheritance access to their Casa vaults.

item.title: Bitcoin options open interest for March expiry on Deribit hits record levels
item.content:encoded:
摘要：
这些信息是积极的。首先，活动可能对比特币价格产生向上压力。其次，供应减少可能导致价格上涨。第三，机构投资者的参与可能进一步推动价格。第四，半减产可能导致比特币价格上涨。最后，大规模购买行为也可能推动价格上涨。
This activity could potentially exert upward pressure on the price of bitcoin.

item.title: 21Shares launches Toncoin staking ETP on SIX Swiss Exchange
item.content:encoded:
摘要：
这些信息是积极的。21Shares推出了Toncoin质押ETP，该代币本月显著上涨，因为Telegram整合了该代币。
21Shares has launched the Toncoin staking ETP amid the token's notable surge this month following integration by Telegram.

item.title: Wealth market eyeing 3% allocation to bitcoin, says Bitwise CIO
item.content:encoded:
摘要：这些信息是积极的。专业投资者对比特币的配置比例从1%增加到3%。根据Bitwise首席投资官Matt Hougan的说法，3%现在是新的1%。
For professional investors, “3% is the new 1%” allocation to bitcoin, according to Bitwise CIO Matt Hougan.

item.title: Fetch.ai, SingularityNET and Ocean Protocol tokens surge amid proposed merger plans
item.content:encoded:
摘要：
这些信息是积极的。提议的合并将使两个代币合并为ASI，全面市值约为75亿美元。
The proposed merger would see the respective tokens combined to create ASI with a fully diluted value of around $7.5 billion.

item.title: Aptos's native token jumps over 15% to hit all-time high
item.content:encoded:
摘要：
这些信息是积极的。前Meta高管创立的区块链平台的本地代币创下历史新高，达到18.78美元。
The native token for the blockchain founded by former Meta executives hit an all-time high of $18.78 on Tuesday.

item.title: BlackRock’s tokenized fund 'brings legitimacy' to public blockchains: Bernstein
item.content:encoded:
摘要：
这些信息是积极的。BlackRock在本月初推出了BUIDL代币化基金，加深了其数字资产领域的探索，此前还推出了现货比特币交易所交易基金。
BlackRock unveiled the BUIDL tokenized fund earlier this month, deepening its foray into digital assets after launching a spot Bitcoin ETF.

item.title: Spot Ethereum ETF approval has 'no positive signs,' says ETF expert
item.content:encoded:
摘要：
这些信息是消极的。Bloomberg高级ETF分析师Eric Balchunas认为，以太坊ETF获得批准的可能性非常悲观，仅为25%。
Bloomberg Senior ETF Analyst Eric Balchunas believes that the odds of an ether ETF garnering approval are "a very pessimistic 25%."

item.title: Bitcoin price breaks out above $71,000, causing spike in short liquidations
item.content:encoded:
摘要：这些信息是负面的。在过去24小时中，比特币的价格上涨导致了超过5600万美元的比特币空单清算。
The upward price trajectory of bitcoin over the past 24 hours has resulted in over $56 million worth of bitcoin short liquidations.

item.title: Ark Invest sells another $21 million worth of Coinbase shares as price jumps 10%
item.content:encoded:
摘要：
这些信息是消极的。Ark Invest在周一又卸掉了74,291股Coinbase股票，继续重新平衡其基金权重。
Ark Invest offloaded another 74,291 Coinbase shares on Monday as the investment firm continues to rebalance its fund weightings.

item.title: Bitcoin back above $67,000, but market volatility causes spike in liquidations
item.content:encoded:
摘要：这些信息是负面的。在过去24小时，比特币价格上涨导致了将近4000万美元的比特币空头头寸被清算。
Bitcoin's upward price trajectory in the past 24 hours has caused almost $40 million in BTC short liquidations.

item.title: Global crypto funds saw record net outflows of nearly $1 billion last week
item.content:encoded:
摘要：
这些信息是消极的。加密货币基金经历了七周的资金净流入后首次出现了周净流出，总计123亿美元。
This represents the first weekly net outflows crypto funds have witnessed following a seven-week streak of inflows totaling $12.3 billion.

item.title: Orderly Network set to airdrop token this summer as it launches points program
item.content:encoded:
摘要：
这些信息是积极的。Orderly Network，一个去中心化交易基础设施协议，已经在今年夏天的代币发行前推出了其积分计划。
Orderly Network, a decentralized trading infrastructure protocol, has launched its points program ahead of its token launch this summer.

item.title: Singapore’s DigiFT launches US T-Bill RWA tokens
item.content:encoded:
摘要：这些信息是积极的。DigiFT表示，新的RWA代币为用户提供了对AA+评级和短期国债的直接有益所有权。
DigiFT says the new RWA tokens offer users direct beneficial ownership of AA+ rated and short-term T-Bills.

item.title: Next week in crypto: $200 million in OP, DYDX unlocks, SBF's sentencing, and more upcoming events
item.content:encoded:
摘要：
这些信息是消极的。检察官希望将Bankman-Fried关押数十年，而他的家人、朋友甚至监狱室友都请求宽大处理。
Prosecutors want to lock Bankman-Fried up for decades while his family, friends, and even prison roommates have asked for leniency.

item.title: Bitcoin ETFs see full week of net outflows, record low inflows for BlackRock, Fidelity
item.content:encoded:
摘要：这些信息是消极的。比特币价格从历史最高点下跌，导致现货比特币交易所交易基金在华尔街表现最疲弱的一周。
Spot bitcoin exchange-traded funds had their weakest week yet on Wall Street as Bitcoin's price tumbles from its all-time high.

item.title: Kraken UK Managing Director says he would 'absolutely' like to see a bitcoin ETF in the UK
item.content:encoded:
摘要：
这些信息是积极的。文章指出，英国正准备允许机构投资者投资比特币ETNs，但零售用户被美国比特币ETF禁止。
Currently, the UK is getting ready to allow institutional investors access to bitcoin ETNs — but retails users are banned from US bitcoin ETFs.

item.title: Much of GBTC's outflows come from Genesis selling shares, says analyst
item.content:encoded:
摘要：
这些信息是消极的。比特币价格于3月22日跌破64,000美元，而Genesis可能正在出售其GBTC以买入低点。
Bitcoin's price fell below $64,000 on March 22, and Genesis might be selling its GBTC to buy the dip.

item.title: Spot Ethereum ETF approval in May seems 'extremely unlikely,' says Galaxy's Thorn
item.content:encoded:
摘要：这些信息是消极的。Galaxy Digital的Alex Thorn表示，由于SEC的传讯和缺乏积极参与，现在高度怀疑5月份会批准现货以太坊ETF。
Galaxy Digital's Alex Thorn indicates that approval of spot Ethereum ETFs in May is now highly doubtful due to SEC subpoenas and a lack of engagement.

item.title: Bitcoin investment by sovereign wealth funds still faces obstacles, analyst says
item.content:encoded:
摘要：
这些信息是消极的。文章指出，说服世界主权财富基金投资比特币仍然面临挑战。分析人士表示，仍然存在一些障碍使得主权财富基金对比特币的投资持保留态度。
Convincing the world's sovereign wealth funds about the advantages of investing in bitcoin still poses challenges, according to an analyst.

item.title: Bitcoin dips below $64,000 as stocks hit record highs
item.content:encoded:
摘要：这些信息是消极的。比特币价格跌破65000美元，尽管主要股指创历史新高，受降息预期推动。
Bitcoin dropped below $65,000, despite major stock indices hitting record highs fueled by rate cut expectations.

item.title: Ark Invest sells $52 million worth of COIN as share price bounces to yearly high
item.content:encoded:
摘要: 这些信息是积极的。COIN在本周上涨了10％，从周二的加密市场低谷反弹，达到新的年度高点。
COIN has surged 10% over this week, bouncing back from a crypto-related market slump on Tuesday to reach a new yearly high.

item.title: JPMorgan says bitcoin remains in 'overbought territory' despite recent correction
item.content:encoded:
摘要：这些信息是消极的
比特币上周经历了一次调整，本周反弹，但仍处于JPMorgan认为的“超买区域”。
Bitcoin underwent a correction last week before rebounding this week, but it still remains in "overbought territory," according to JPMorgan.

item.title: Solana declared most popular blockchain so far this year by CoinGecko Research
item.content:encoded:
摘要：
这些信息是积极的。根据CoinGecko研究，Solana在2024年被宣布为迄今为止最受欢迎的区块链生态系统。
Solana has been declared the most popular blockchain ecosystem so far in 2024, according to CoinGecko Research.

item.title: When it comes to bitcoin's price, ETF inflows are only part of the picture
item.content:encoded:
摘要：
这些信息是积极的。文章讨论了比特币ETF的流入对价格走势的影响，并指出了其他影响价格的因素。文章提到了监视比特币ETF流入并将其与价格走势对应的简单性，但也强调了其他因素的重要性。
While it can be easy to watch the spot bitcoin ETF inflows and correlate them to price action, there are other factors at play.

item.title: Bernstein raises year-end bitcoin price target to $90,000, expects ‘mild’ halving impact on miners
item.content:encoded:
摘要：这些信息是积极的。Bernstein已将比特币的2024年价格目标从$80,000上调至$90,000，并认为矿工是最好的股权代理。
Bernstein has revised its 2024 price target for bitcoin to $90,000 from $80,000 and continues to see miners as the best equity proxy.

item.title: Coinbase legal chief argues SEC has ‘no good reason’ to deny spot Ethereum ETFs
item.content:encoded:
摘要：
这些信息是消极的。保罗·格罗瓦尔谴责有关以太币的持续“错误信息”，加密社区正在等待SEC对现货以太坊ETF的决定。
Paul Grewal decried continued “misinformation” about ether as the crypto community awaits a decision from the SEC on spot Ethereum ETFs.

item.title: RWA tokens and memecoins post gains in crypto rebound
item.content:encoded:
摘要：
这些信息是积极的。根据CoinGecko数据，RWA代币市值现在达到了55.4亿美元，过去24小时增长了超过31%。
The RWA token market cap now stands at $5.54 billion, an increase of over 31% in the last 24 hours, according to CoinGecko data.

item.title: Coinbase to launch futures trading for dogecoin, litecoin, and bitcoin bash on April 1st
item.content:encoded:
摘要：这些信息是积极的。Coinbase Derivatives计划推出狗狗币、莱特币和比特币现金的期货交易。这将为投资者提供更多选择，并增加加密货币市场的多样性。Coinbase的期货交易将为投资者提供更多灵活性和机会。
Coinbase Derivatives plans to kick off futures trading for dogecoin, alongside litecoin and bitcoin cash.

item.title: Robinhood rolls out crypto wallet to Android users globally
item.content:encoded:
摘要：
这些信息是积极的。Robinhood已经将其加密货币钱包推出全球Android用户，扩大了数百万潜在加密货币用户的访问范围。
Robinhood has rolled out its cryptocurrency wallet to Android users globally, expanding access to millions of potential crypto users.

item.title: Bitcoin climbs back above $63,500 as market volatility causes spike in liquidations
item.content:encoded:
摘要：
这些信息是正面的。比特币价格回升至超过63,000美元，但市场波动性也导致清算激增。
Bitcoin climbed back above the $63,000 mark, but market volatility has also led to a spike in liquidations.

item.title: AI-related tokens post gains as wider crypto market remains volatile
item.content:encoded:
摘要：
这些信息是积极的。尽管整个加密货币市场在同一时期出现下滑，但主要与人工智能相关的代币在过去24小时内出现了反弹。
Despite a downturn in the wider cryptocurrency market in the same period, major AI-related tokens have rallied in the past 24 hours.

item.title: US spot Bitcoin ETFs surge past $150 billion in cumulative trading volume
item.content:encoded:
摘要：这些信息是消极的。在比特币价格下跌约10%的情况下，现货比特币ETF创出历史净流出记录。这发生在该ETF取得100亿美元资产管理规模的里程碑之际。
The milestone comes amid record net outflows for the spot bitcoin ETFs on Tuesday as bitcoin’s price dropped around 10%.

item.title: Bitcoin, Ether fall while spot bitcoin ETFs log record outflows
item.content:encoded:
摘要：这些信息是消极的。比特币和以太币的价格下跌到过去两周内的最低点，同时现货比特币ETF出现了创纪录的大规模资金流出。
The price of bitcoin and ether dropped to its lowest point in the past two weeks as spot bitcoin ETFs saw record outflows earlier this week.

item.title: Bernstein analysts see bitcoin ‘dip buying opportunity’ ahead of the halving
item.content:encoded:
摘要：
这些信息是积极的。根据伯恩斯坦分析师的预测，预计在比特币的分叉事件之前，会出现进一步的整合，然后牛市将继续。
Bernstein analysts expect further consolidation ahead of Bitcoin’s halving event in April, with the bull market then continuing.

item.title: BlackRock Managing Director says spot bitcoin ETFs are satisfying 'pent-up demand'
item.content:encoded:
摘要：
这些信息是积极的。在文章中，BlackRock Managing Director Tony Ashraf解释了推动客户需求的三个关键领域。这些领域包括环境、社会和公司治理（ESG）投资、数字化转型以及可持续基础设施。客户对这些领域的需求正在不断增长，反映了他们对可持续和创新投资的兴趣。
BlackRock Managing Director Tony Ashraf explained the company is seeing three key areas that are driving demand from its clients.

item.title: MicroStrategy now holds over 1% of bitcoin's total supply after latest purchase
item.content:encoded:
摘要：
这些信息是积极的。MicroStrategy以6.23亿美元现金收购了9,245个比特币，将其总比特币持有量增加到214,246 BTC。这一举措进一步证实了MicroStrategy对比特币的信心和扩大数字资产投资组合的意愿。
Michael Saylor's MicroStrategy acquired 9,245 more bitcoins for $623 million in cash, increasing its total bitcoin holdings to 214,246 BTC.

item.title: Bitwise CIO says spot ether ETFs could attract more assets if they launch later than May
item.content:encoded:
摘要：
这些信息是积极的。比特币Bitwise首席投资官Matt Hougan表示，华尔街需要时间来消化现货比特币ETF，然后再扩展到新品种。
Bitwise CIO Matt Hougan said Wall Street needs time to digest the spot bitcoin ETFs before expanding to new ones.

item.title: Bitcoin flash crash below $9,000 on BitMEX's USDT spot market had no impact on derivatives, exchange says
item.content:encoded:
摘要：
这些信息是积极的。BitMEX表示，BTC-USDT现货市场短暂下跌至9000美元并没有影响平台的衍生品市场。
The temporary drop below $9,000 on its BTC-USDT spot market did not impact the platform’s derivative markets, BitMEX said.

item.title: Spot Ethereum ETFs may bring up to $45 billion of inflows if approved, says Standard Chartered Bank
item.content:encoded:
摘要：

这些信息是积极的。如果5月23日批准，标准型央行预测，首次引入以太坊ETF可能在首年内带来高达450亿美元的资金流入。
Spot Ethereum ETFs could bring up to $45 billion in inflows in the first 12 months if approved on May 23, according to Standard Chartered.

item.title: Bitcoin could experience a positive demand shock from RIAs: analyst
item.content:encoded:
摘要：
这些信息是积极的。一位分析师告诉The Block，比特币可能会经历来自注册投资顾问的积极需求冲击。
Bitcoin could experience a positive demand shock from registered investment advisors, an analyst told The Block.

item.title: Dogwifhat memecoin iconic photo sold as NFT for $4.3 million
item.content:encoded:
摘要：这些信息是积极的。加密交易商巨大重生公司（GCR）在Foundation平台上以1,210.8 ETH的价格赢得了标的。
Crypto trader Gigantic Rebirth Ventures (GCR) made the winning bid of 1,210.8 ETH on the Foundation platform.

item.title: Standard Chartered raises Bitcoin price target to $150,000 by year-end
item.content:encoded:
摘要: 这些信息是积极的。标准银行将比特币价格预测目标从之前的10万元提高到15万元。
Standard Chartered Bank has raised its bitcoin price prediction target to $150,000 from its previous estimate of $100,000.

item.title: Figure launches new blockchain-focused entity after raising $60 million in Series A
item.content:encoded:
摘要：
这些信息是积极的。Figure Technologies宣布推出一家名为Figure Markets的公司，主要专注于开发基于区块链的交易所。
Figure Technologies announced that it is launching a company named Figure Markets, focused on developing a blockchain-native exchange.

item.title: Crypto.com's CEO believes bitcoin price in December 2020 phase of cycle
item.content:encoded:
摘要: 这些信息是积极的。根据Kris Marzsalek的说法，从零售业的信号来看，我们可能处于2020年12月或2021年1月。
"Looking at the data and the intent, as a signal from the retail side, we are probably at December 2020 or January 2021," Kris Marzsalek told CNBC.

item.title: Solana price approaches $200 for first time since December 2021
item.content:encoded:
摘要：
这些信息是积极的。Solana的市值达到创纪录的847亿美元，因为其高价满足了更大的供应。
Solana's market cap has reached an all-time high of $84.7 billion as its high price meets an even greater supply.

item.title: US Bitcoin ETFs are a ‘monumental milestone’ says Coinbase UK CEO, while ETNs in the UK are a ‘positive step’
item.content:encoded:
摘要：
这些信息是积极的。Coinbase UK首席执行官Daniel Seifert表示即将推出的加密货币ETN是对英国及其战略的验证。
Coinbase UK CEO Daniel Seifert says the upcoming crypto ETNs are a validation for the UK and its strategy.

item.title: Ether spot ETF end of May approval odds plummet to 28% on Polymarket
item.content:encoded:
摘要：
这些信息是消极的。根据Polymarket预测市场的数据，到5月底以太坊现货ETF获批的可能性已降至28%。
The likelihood of approval for an ether spot ETF by the end of May has decreased to 28% on the Polymarket predictions market.

item.title: Tether CEO Paolo Ardoino says pricing hard to predict as next bitcoin halving approaches
item.content:encoded:
摘要：
这些信息是积极的。文章提到比特币减半即将到来，Tether CEO Paolo Ardoino表示其对价格的影响可能难以预测。
With the bitcoin halving expected to occur in a matter of a weeks, Tether CEO Paolo Ardoino says its effect on price could be hard to predict.
